purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.text:
A quiz program for dates

Originally developed at the Békásmegyeri Veres Péter Gimnázium (a high school in Hungary) by some students for internal usage, but this program can be used in general too.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.text: A terse description about installing, accessing and using the program can be found in the wiki at the GitHub repo.

contributors.title: Contributors
contributors.text: Currently we do not maintain a static list of contributors. For an accurate list refer to the corresponding GitHub insights page, which generates an infographic based on every change anyone made.

currentVersion.title: Version information
currentVersion.errorMessage: Simple version information is not available for this deployment
